graph_title: Nombre de victimes d’homicide volontaire pour 100 000 habitants, par sexe et âge
indicator_name: Nombre de victimes d’homicide volontaire pour 100 000 habitants, par sexe et âge
SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.1: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.1.1: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex and age
STAT_CONC_DEF: The indicator is defined as the total count of victims of intentional homicide divided by the total population, expressed per 100,000 population.

SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 16.1.1: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex and age
